conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: walls extruded with thickness, angled/isometric perspective, and roof/ceiling removed to reveal interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness, readable corners and floor planes, and clean cutaway presentation; only minor simplification of some junctions/openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall apartment massing and main zones (large left space + balcony, multiple bedrooms, central wet area) resemble the plan, but several plan-specific features are altered or missing (notably separate WC vs bath separation, stair/recess zone, and some partition placements/proportions). Door/window locations appear generalized rather than matching the 2D plan precisely.

interior_elements.notes: Beds and living/sofa area present; bathroom has fixtures (tub, toilet, shower/vanity). Kitchen elements are not clearly represented relative to the plan (activity room in 2D vs living-only in 3D). Furniture generally placed plausibly within rooms.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with good separation of walls/floors and sufficient lighting to read spaces; no UI/text clutter and minimal artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Layout fidelity issues: some partitions and room proportions do not align closely with the 2D plan, and the stair/recess zone is not clearly represented.
Bathroom/WC configuration appears consolidated/changed compared to the 2D plan which shows separate Bath and WC rooms.
Doors/windows are present but several appear placed generically and may not correspond to the exact walls/opening sizes shown in the 2D plan.

summary: A clearly valid 3D cutaway with strong volumetric modeling, but with notable deviations from the 2D plan’s exact partitioning and bath/WC/stair-area layout.
